name: ICAFE4J-V0.0
body:
It has been many years since I started this repository. It all came out of personal interest and had no intention to make it public. One of the reason is my personality. I don't like to be tied into something which may want your attention when you are not in the mood to be on it - a pull not a push operation.

But anyway, for other reasons such as a place to keep my work from lost, I finally put this one on GIT and I am glad I did that while looking back.

Ever since I published the snapshot, users for this library have been asking me to have a public release instead. As kind of perfectionist, I am still not so pleased about a few things that I haven't been able to finish but believed I would be for this library. But after the past few years, due to outside and inside factors including health related issues, I don't see I can get the wish list items done in a near future or even possible to get them done.

For all these, I am releasing this library in its current status as v0.0. Hope this will make it easier for users.
